long_description: The Deuter Speed Lite 20 pack weighs just over 1 lb.-less weight means more comfort and energy for adventure racing, climbing, short ski tours or just walking around town. Padded back panel and contoured shoulder straps feature breathable air-mesh for air circulation and quick-drying comfort. Removable hipbelt and sternum strap allow you to strip the pack down for even more weight savings. Removable, tensioned Delrin(R) thermoplastic U-frame rod is flexible, supportive and light. V-shaped pack body allows freedom of movement and properly positions your load between your shoulders. Spacious main compartment is complemented by a small valuables pocket and a large mesh front pocket that is perfect for stowing a jacket, gloves, climbing skins or wet clothes. Mesh side pockets hold snacks or water bottles. Compression straps double as attachment points for skis, ice axes or poles. Hydration-compatible design features a 3-liter reservoir pocket and drink tube exit port for on-the-go hydration (reservoir sold separately). The Deuter Speed Lite 20 pack is made of tough Hexlite 210 ripstop nylon; bottom is reinforced with a second fabric layer.
short_description: The Deuter Speed Lite 20 pack weighs just over 1 lb.-less weight means more comfort and energy for adventure racing, climbing, short ski tours or just walking around town.
